points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

points.title: Information is provided about security practices
points.status: "TPDb takes steps to ensure that your information is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy." -Privacy Policy

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
points.status: "If any provision of this Agreement is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that this Agreement shall otherwise remain enforceable and in full force and effect." -Terms of Service

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
points.status: "Your access to and use of the Services or any User Content is at your own risk. YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED TO YOU ON AN “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS." -Terms of Service

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.status: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, you agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless TPDb, its officers, licensors, directors, employees and agents, from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to legal fees)" -Terms of Service

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to CAD $50
Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: "TPDb may use third party services such as Google Analytics that collect, monitor and analyze this type of information in order to increase our Site’s functionality." -Privacy Policy

points.title: No need to register
points.status: "You can use parts of the Site and Service, such as browsing and searching for Content, without having a TPDb account." -Terms of Service

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Ontario, Canada
points.status: "This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the law of the Province of Ontario and the law of Canada applicable therein." -Terms of Service

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
points.status: "You must be at least 13 years of age or over the age required by the laws of your country to use or access the Services or Site, provide personal information to TPDb, or otherwise submit personal information through the Services." -Terms of Service

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.status: "To the extent permitted by applicable law and unless otherwise agreed, all disputes and claims pertaining to the Agreement, the Services or Site, shall be determined by final and binding arbitration by a single arbitrator to the exclusion of the courts in Toronto, Canada, in accordance with the Arbitration Act, 1991 (Ontario), as amended." -Terms of Service

points.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
points.status: "(c) be free from errors or that defects will be corrected" -Terms of Service

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
